text: William D. "Don" Parkinson (1942 – August 31, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the Speaker of the Guam LegislatureGuampedia. Guam Legislature, Hagatna, Guam. from 1995 to 1997 and as Majority Leader from 1989 to 1995. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Guam. He was a member of the legislature from 1983 to 1997. He was born in Idaho. Parkinson died on August 31, 2020, aged 77–78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Legislative speakers Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Lawyers from Idaho Category:Guam Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Idaho
title: Don Parkinson (politician)
